Name: submission_directory
Description: Output directory for script to process submissions at

Name: joint_SRA_BioSample_submission
Description: Submit SRA and BioSample together as one submission

Name: metadata_file_sep
Description: File seperator used in your metadata file

Name: fasta_sample_name_col
Description: Metadata column of sequence name used in fasta file

Name: baseline_surveillance
Description: If performing baseline_sequencing setting this to True will add baseline_sequencing tag to all of your submissions

Name: api_url
Description: API url for pulling down files from NCBI https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/api/2.0/files/FILE_ID/?format=attachment

Name: ncbi_ftp_path_to_submission_folders
Description: If your FTP site does not directly have the folders for Production/Test then provide the path for this. Typically left blank

Name: Genbank_auto_remove_sequences_that_fail_qc
Description: Genbank can automatically remove sequences that fail submission qc in order to not stall submissions

Name: SRA_file_location
Description: Whether you are submitting SRA files via manual upload or cloud link
Required: Yes, if submitting to SRA File/Cloud

Name: SRA_file_column1
Description: Either name of file if uploading or full path to cloud link

Name: SRA_file_column2
Description: Either name of file if uploading or full path to cloud link
Required: Yes, if submitting to SRA and you have multiple files

Name: SRA_file_loader
Description: Leave blank unless notified by SRA team you need to use a specific loader for your SRA files

Name: column_names
Description: Database field to column name of metadata

Name: create_cmt
Description: Create cmt file to go with submission

Name: column_names
Description: Database field to column name of metadata

Name: column_names
Description: Database field to column name of metadata

Name: column_names
Description: Database field to column name of metadata

Name: column_names
Description: Database field to column name of metadata

Name: Update_sequences_on_Genbank_auto_removal
Description: If using Genbank auto-remove qc then use this to update the GISAID submission based on what is accepted by Genbank
